Body:
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPatternUniform(normalization=10.0, regions=[(0, 2, 0,
    2)])
image = 10.0 * np.ones((3, 3))
ci_pre_cti = ci_data.ci_pre_cti_from_ci_pattern_geometry_image_and_mask(
    ci_pattern=pattern, image=image)
assert (ci_pre_cti == np.array([[10.0, 10.0, 0.0], [10.0, 10.0, 0.0], [0.0,
    0.0, 0.0]])).all()
